title: Ron Perlman Joins ‘Harry Potter’ Spinoff ‘Fantastic Beasts’
text:
Ron Perlman Joins ‘Harry Potter’ Spinoff ‘Fantastic Beasts’ 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them has just found itself a Beast. Ron Perlman is set to join the Harry Potter spinoff, which stars Eddi... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
